sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class Createnew extends React.Component { submitHandler = event => { event.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:5000/api/contact/createnew/", { name: event.target.name.value, phone: event.target.phone.value, email: event.target.email.value, profession: event.target.profession.value, linkedin: event.target.linkedin.value, github: event.target.github.value }) .then(res => console.log(res.data)); }; render() { return (

Name

Enter a phone number:


Format: XXX-XXX-XXXX

Enter your email:

Profession

LinkedIn URL

Git Hub URL

); } }
